div.div: Heritage Community Charter School in Caldwell, Idaho is a 4 star public charter school providing classical education instruction combined with a Spanish immersion program. Created through a caring and highly qualified staff is a culture designed for student achievement. HCCS is an excellent option for grades K-8 in Caldwell, Idaho and surrounding areas including Boise, Meridian, Nampa, Notus and Middleton.

img.alt: Center For Disease Control and Prevention

hr.p: Public health officials advise that schools continue with normally recommended measures to prevent the spread of viruses in schools. Schools will be providing reminders and lessons on good hand and respiratory hygiene.
There are also simple things you can do to help your family and others stay healthy. Please take some time in the coming days to review the following with your child:

li.a: Wash hands frequently with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.

ul.li: Use a hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol if soap and water are not available.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.
Practice good respiratory hygiene, covering coughs and sneezes with your elbow or a tissue that is then thrown away, followed by washing your hands.
Students with a fever should stay home from school.
Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces using a regular household cleaning spray or wipes.
Get your annual flu vaccine (to protect against flu).

hr.p: Los funcionarios de salud pública aconsejan que las escuelas continúen con las medidas normalmente recomendadas para prevenir la propagación de virus en las escuelas. Las escuelas proporcionarán recordatorios y lecciones sobre buena higiene de manos y respiratoria.
También hay cosas simples que puede hacer para ayudar a su familia y a otras personas a mantenerse saludables. Tómese un tiempo en los próximos días para revisar lo siguiente con su hijo (a):

ul.li: Lávense las manos frecuentemente con agua y jabón durante al menos 20 segundos.
Usen un desinfectante para manos con al menos 60% de alcohol si no hay agua y jabón disponibles.
Eviten tocarse los ojos, la nariz y la boca con las manos sin lavar.
Practiquen una buena higiene respiratoria, cubriendo la tos y los estornudos con el codo o un pañuelo desechable, luego lávese las manos.
Los estudiantes con fiebre deben quedarse en casa y no asistir a la escuela.
Limpien y desinfecten los objetos y superficies que se tocan con frecuencia con un aereosol o toallitas de limpieza con cloro.
Obtengan su vacuna anual contra la gripe (para protegerse contra la gripe).
